A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long\, long time fan of Star Wars\, I will say\, it was brilliant. It reminded me fondly of many of the dark twists and character development in the Knights of the Old Republic series. Spended grandiose story\, in which nothing is safe\, or sacred. It is the birth of a new generation of heroes and villains\, as the step from the shadows of the giants before them.
